attributes.action: Call a by-election for South Cambridgeshire as the MP has joined another party.
attributes.background: Heidi Allen has said her constituents support her. Well I dont thinks so. Let her prove it by holding a by-election. If people support her new party's manifesto they can vote for her. If they support conservative manifesto they can ensure it by sitting in parliament.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs to be sacked.

The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.

You might like to sign this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/269912
